title: Milked by Finesse
description: Carly never expected to become a human bovine, milked and allowed to graze. But Lindstrom Lactation Laboratories made her an offer she couldn't refuse. For one thousand dollars, she agreed to spend one week as the property of the lactation lab.She is treated with Milkdown X, a special formula which makes her lactate... and become so sensitive that milking drives her wild with desire. As a human bovine, she is brought to ecstasies she's never experienced before, but also must wear a cow bell around her neck. Will she take her money and run, or will she choose to stay on as a human bovine? All characters are 18 or older.WARNING: Reluctant lactation, dairy cow fantasy, M/F and F/F breastfeeding, and lactation sex, cattle prod vibrators, milking machines, and great gushing sprays of milk.There are six "Milked by Force" books. Each one stands on its own as a complete story.
author: Cherry Dare
